name: SUBZERO-MD
description: Whiskey Sockets Baileys Whatsapp bot By Mr Frank

PREFIX.description: Paste your bot prefix. Note! Don't apply null prefix.

MODE.description: Select your bot work type: public/private-inbox-group.

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Make it true if you want always online.

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: Make it true for automatic status react & seen.

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Make it true for auto reply msg on status seen.

AUTO_STATUS_MSG.description: Type custom message on status reply.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Put the owner number for the bot.

ANTI_LINK.description: Make it true if you want the bot to auto remove group links.

ANTI_BAD.description: Make it true if you want the bot to auto delete bad words.

DELETE_LINKS.description: Remove links from group automatically without removing members.

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Make it true if you want auto recording.

AUTO_TYPING.description: Make it true if you want auto typing.

AUTO_REACT.description: Make it true if you want the bot to react on every message.

CUSTOM_REACT.description: Make it true if you want custom reactions.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Make it true if you want the bot to read all SMS instantly.
